issue.title: [C++] Fix Status propagation in END_PARQUET_CATCH_EXCEPTIONS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13135](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13135). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems `END_PARQUET_CATCH_EXCEPTIONS` misses the logic to propagate a `Status` stored in a `ParquetStatusException`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13135?focusedCommentId=17367581) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10566
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10566>
